attributes.action: The UK electorate has no confidence in Her Magesty’s Government.
attributes.background: The incompetence of this Government goes far beyond its mishandling of Brexit; rising knife crime, failing to deal with the NHS crisis, a hostile environment policy making immigrants feel unwelcome, a culture that allows for elected representatives to be abused. There should be a General Election.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what you mean by a vote of no confidence.

You might like to sign and share one of these petitions instead: 

Hold a Public Vote of No Confidence in the Administration of the United Kingdom 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/237424

Have another general election https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235480

Hold a General Election in April 2019. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/235071

If Theresa May resigns as Prime Minister a general election must be held. https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/252449
